ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Case.Client_Load_Completion_Date__c field from being populated when the Case is created.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISNEW(), Client_Load_Completion_Date__c > DATEVALUE("2000-01-01"), $RecordType.Name = "Service Onboarding MMS Payroll Case Former" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Client Load Completion Date field can not be populated when a Case is being created. This field should only be updated after the Client Load has been completed.
